page.title: 18HOCKWELL RING DAY CENTRE
page.content: This is a{day centre}for old people.There was an old lady who was a{hundred years old!}She was sitting on a settee all crouched up.The old people think youths are getting spoilt by their parents.The area is a quiet place.The houses are detached and some of them are bungalows.In other parts of Hockwell Ring,there are also a lot of very tall flats and lots of Council houses.There are some shops,a Club and a Pub.The Day Centre is 10 years old.People mostly{walk}there because they live next to the Centre.Some come by{ambulance.}They like coming here because they can get to know each other better.When it was time to go, the Manager gave us all a Lime drink.It was refreshing!I enjoyed that!
